element.short: Named part of a parameter (e.g. Tuple)
element.definition: A named part of a parameter. In many implementation context, a set of named parts is known as a "Tuple".
element.comments: Only one level of Tuples is allowed.

constraint.human: A part must have a value or a resource, but not both
constraint.xpath: exists(f:value) or exists(f:resource) and not(exists(f:value) and exists(f:resource))
